title: Task 35

answers.feedback: Project management is about organizing tasks systematically, not randomly.

answers.answer: Planning, organizing, and overseeing tasks and resources to complete a project successfully

answers.feedback: Project management involves considering deadlines and budgets, not ignoring them.
Collaboration and teamwork are essential in project management. Avoiding them is not a good idea.

description: Project management means planning, organizing, and overseeing tasks and resources to complete a project successfully. It involves coordinating people and activities, managing budgets, and ensuring the project is completed on time and within budget.
